#id=1
#text=It had been close to a year since my last trim .
#id=2
#text=I usually make sure I 'm clean if I plan to go to a hairdresser .
#id=3
#text=I jumped in the shower and quickly lathered up .
#id=4
#text=My hair was pretty clean to begin with , but I wanted to make sure I was clean for sure .
#id=5
#text=The haircut place takes walk-in appointments , and I waited barely 5 minutes to be seated in a chair .
#id=6
#text=The attendant was especially nice , and asked how I was , and how I wanted my hair to be done .
#id=7
#text=In the summer I usually keep it quite short , so I asked for most of it to be trimmed off .
#id=8
#text=I asked the hairdresser to go forward with what they thought was best .
#id=9
#text=I usually ask this because they are trained to judge what appearances would work best for certain people .
#text=Overall , it took 15 minutes for the haircut to finish .
#text=After a quick dusting off , I was on my way home with a fresh look .
